title: My Lol keeps going to 0 KBps!! HOW DO I FIX PLEASE ANSWER
body:
When i open league it runs perfectly until it his up to 90 percent then after 10 seconds or so it just goes to 0 KBps and i have waited for it to respond but it doesnt and i have to restart it! so do you guys know what to do? please refer to it as on mac please.
Thanks

replies.body: Yeah just leave it on, it should sort itself out in no time.
Stop restarting it and leave it be... -.-
